sentence.Network_en: He was afraid that the ringmaster would beat him again.
sentence.Network_cn: 他害怕驯兽师又来打他.

sentence.Network_en: Say hello to the audience, shouted the ringmaster.

entry.def: A circus ringmaster is the person who introduces the performers and the animals.

means.word_mean: 1. the person in charge of performances in a circus ring

auth_sentence.content: He holds the stage at press conferences, ever the ringmaster.
auth_sentence.res_content: He holds the stage at press conferences, ever the ringmaster.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He holds the stage at press conferences, ever the ringmaster.

auth_sentence.content: Tonight in Fort Lauderdale he is the leering, jokey ringmaster, conducting and playing the violin.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tonight in Fort Lauderdale he is the leering, jokey ringmaster, conducting and playing the violin.

auth_sentence.content: The duty and the art of being a circus ringmaster is to keep "the talent" in willing suspension of disbelief that they may fall.
